DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn whether aripiprazole has effect on the steady-state pharmacokinetics of venlafaxine in healthy subjects. The safety and tolerability of aripiprazole and venlafaxine co-administration will also be studied.
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole and Effexor XR Drug Interaction Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female subjects, ages 18 to 45 (WOCBP) must be using an adequate method of contraception to avoid pregnancy throughout the study and for up to 4 weeks after the study in such a manner that the risk of pregnancy is minimized. Body Mass Index (BMI) of 18 to 33 kg/m2, inclusive. Subjects with a decrease in SBP of >=20 mm Hg and increase in HR of >=20 bpm after 2 minutes standing vs. 2 minutes supine at screening or with frank orthostatic hypotension at screening. Supine BP of 90/50 mm Hg or lower at screening SBP >=140 mm Hg or DBP >=90 mm Hg at screening
